text: so one of my favorite services is aws

application

my name is inhua and i'm a container

compute team here at amazon web services

specialist solutions architect on the

customers adopt continuous technology to
build modern applications in aws i've
been aws since 2015 and has the
opportunity to experience various roles
from enterprise solution architect
developer specialist a lot of change
over the years in cloud computing

service technology to build their
application as part of the wwso compute
team i'm responsible to help our
customers make the right compute choices
and serverless may not always be the
best fit for all situations so it is
important that i collaborate with other
specialists on the compute team to make
sure we help our customers make the
right choices i often hear questions on
which container orchestrator to use and
how to leverage serverless computing to
improve their security and reduce costs
with aws target i do not need to manage
servers and get improved security
through workload isolation so serverless
and asean has evolved from a tool for id
automation to become a primary compute
choice for designing core application
workloads and serverless has cut across
multiple industries and this maturity of

are asking us i'm passionate about

that in a domain i'm passionate about
just serverless i continue to be amazed
by the talented people i work with at
aws it's a constant motivation to push

enjoy working in a fast-paced
